metadata.source: Devil's Thumb Distillery Excisable Product Summary (July 2024 - June 2025)
metadata.methodology: Average bottles per batch based on actual stock movements (Wholesale + Cellar Door combined)

notes.Pineapple_200: ESTIMATED - No bottling data available, using 700ml ratio
notes.Spiced_200: ESTIMATED - No bottling data available, using 700ml ratio
notes.Merchant_Mae_Vodka: ESTIMATED - Using Merchant Mae Gin capacity (same base)
notes.Coffee_Liqueur_700: ESTIMATED - No bottling data available, conservative estimate
notes.Navy_200: LOW CONFIDENCE - Only 1 batch recorded (100 bottles)
